lead_paragraph: The pilot, David Wood, was working on a fuel-loading operation on the remote ice shelf on Monday when he got out of the helicopter and fell more than 60 feet.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Pilot Dies in Antarctica

snippet: The pilot, David Wood, was working on a fuel-loading operation on the remote ice shelf on Monday when he got out of the helicopter and fell more than 60 feet.
abstract: Canadian helicopter pilot David Wood dies after landing on remote ice shelf in Antarctica.
